wayToRun: c++ or java or python or node
!comment: wayToRun can either be: node | python | java | c++ - must have these installed on your computer beforehand(for c++ use the gcc compiler, i recommended using mingw - https://sourceforge.net/projects/mingw/files/latest/download)
!comment2: fileToRun can NOT have the file type in it (ie for server.js just put in server)
!comment3: port is the port on your computer to run the github update listening server on
